title: How do I get my account authorized?
body: I try to upvote or comment and it says i need to be authorized and/or i need to be level 6.

replies.body: Sometimes if you haven't used the boards in a long time, your Boards and Summoner profiles become desynced. Making a discussion post such as this one on H&S typically forces a resync, which seems to have happened. You now show as level 30 and should have no issues posting on other sections of the boards. Happy posting! ^.^
